text: Calfreisen is a former municipality of the district Plessur in the Swiss canton of Graubünden. On 1 January 2013, the former municipalities of Calfreisen, Castiel, Langwies, Lüen, Molinis, Peist and St. Peter-Pagig merged into the municipality of Arosa. ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Calfreisen
